Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Mmmm, this is scrumptious! There's nothing
quite like a good meal after a hard day's work.

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Urk! *cough* *hack* *sputter* I...I'm okay! I
just ate a little too quickly. Went down the
wrong pipe, that's all... *cough*

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Still at it? At this hour?! My, my! You've got
quite the work ethic! ...Me? I'm, uh...cleaning
up the mess I made. Eheheh...

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Our lady's food always looks so rich and
succulent! I wish I could try it sometime. Just
one bite would do...

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Miss Elise is a v-very kind person, you know!
...It's true!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
I made a biiiiiiiig mistake the other day, and it
almost cost me my job.
<PAGE>
I continue to thank my lucky stars that I was
given a second chance!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Okay, so first up is...er...and then, I have
to...mm-hmm, I see, I see. Well, that settles it.
<PAGE>
I am ridiculously busy!

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
I feel like Miss Elise is a lot nicer to me these
days than ever before. I wonder what's come
over her...

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
I'm not a very patient person, so I tend to make
an awful lot of mistakes.
<PAGE>
But it seems like Miss Elise's heart has warmed
these days, as she hardly ever yells at us
anymore.

<NAME_MOB_ZAZIE>
Miss Elise's heart of coldest ice has finally
melted. I had almost given up hope...
